entry.tran: （社会、制度等）组织有序的，结构井然的
entry.def: An ordered society or system is well-organized and has a clear structure.

example.ex: An objective set of rules which we all agree to accept is necessary for any ordered society.
example.tran: 任何井然有序的社会都需要一套客观公正、为大家所接受的规则。

means.word_mean: 1. having a systematic arrangement; especially having elements succeeding in order according to rule;
2. marked by system or regularity or discipline;
3. disposed or placed in a particular kind of order;
4. marked by an orderly, logical, and aesthetically consistent relation of parts;
